frameDefinitions: A Speaker mentions a Specified_entity filling a Role, thereby providing information which supports a point of the Speaker.

The Becoming_detached frame covers two situations: a scene in which one thing comes to be physically detached from something else; or a scene in which two things come to be disconnected from each other.
In a text, a Source_of_information is given that provides a reader of the text with further Information relevant to the text.
These words relate to the relative ordering of two events or times.
An Evader moves under its own power to thereby avoid Capture  or contact with a Pursuer, also generally moving under its own power.
frameExamples: He cites the chief original observations <t>adduced</t> by Darwin as evidence for his theory.
The ship became <t>decoupled</t> from the dock.
In Densmore's days it was sometimes made of an old-fashioned man's celluloid collar (<t>cf.</t> Densmore 1943: 116).
The hand <t>around</t> the sword-hilt was no less impressive than the sword .
<t>After</t> she arrived , she laid out her papers on the desk.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person who specifies the <fen>Role</fen> to be filled by the <fen>Specified_entity</fen>.
<fen>Medium</fen> is the physical entity or channel used by the <fen>Speaker</fen> to transmit the statement.
The entity that the <fen>Speaker</fen> identifies as filling a particular <fen>Role</fen>.
A slot in a particular or generic event or relation whose filler the <fen>Speaker</fen> identifies.
The time when the statement is made.
The role specifies the place where the statement takes place.
This role identifies the <fen>Item</fen> that detaches from the <fen>Source</fen>.
<fen>Source</fen> identifies the location to which an <fen>Item</fen> was attached before getting detached.

This role identifies the plural <fen>Items</fen> that are becoming detached from each other, resulting in their separation.


Notice that when the role <fen>Items</fen> occurs, neither <fen>Item</fen> nor <fen>Source</fen> can occur.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Item</fen> becomes detached from the <fen>Source</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Item</fen>  becomes detached.
The <fen>Source_of_information</fen> is referred to as a source of information related to the current text.
The <fen>Figure</fen> is the entity located with respect to the <fen>Ground</fen>.
The <fen>Ground</fen> is the area that the <fen>Figure</fen> surrounds.
The area or zone immediately external to the <fen>Ground</fen>.  This role excludes <fen>Figure</fen> and is only used in particular constructions such as the following:
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Figure</fen> is located around the <fen>Ground</fen>.

The <fen>Focal_occasion</fen> is the event which is  being located in time with respect to some other event: The <fen>Focal_occasion</fen> is profiled, in contrast to the <fen>Landmark_occasion</fen>, which is backgrounded.
The <fen>Landmark_occasion</fen> is the event  with respect to which the <fen>Focal_occasion</fen> is located.
The <fen>Focal_participant</fen> is the participant in the <fen>Focal_occasion</fen> which is profiled as being in a relation of relative time to the <fen>Landmark_occasion</fen>.
The <fen>Evader</fen> moves under its own power to <fen>Capture</fen> or contact with the <fen>Pursuer</fen>. Normally the <fen>Evader</fen> frame element is expressed as an external argument.
The <fen>Pursuer</fen> is going after the <fen>Evader</fen> unless they act.
An actual or hypothetical  event in which the <fen>Pursuer</fen> takes physical control of the <fen>Evader</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which the Evading occurs.
listRoleExamples: But<fex>Arturo Boncato Jr., marketing manager of the Marco Polo Hotel,</fex> cited the high occupancy rates in the hotels as proof of increasing visitors' confidence.
<fex>In a subsequent paper</fex> he adduced further evidence.

Reilly pointed <fex>to the high labor costs</fex> as the
main reason for the decision to close down the New Orleans facility.
TCI named the overly expensive bid price <fex>as the main reason for their strict opposition against a merger</fex>.

Persistent, heavy rainfall and poorly maintained drainage systems were cited
<fex>yesterday</fex> as the prime causes for the rising floodwaters
<fex>In Kuala Lumpur</fex>, he also pointed to the accountability/assessment arena as a place for new businesses to investigate.
The accreting matter forms a disc whose instabilities trigger outbursts (see <fex>Lasota 2001</fex> for a review of the instability model).
He had <fex>both hands</fex> wrapped around her arm .
<fex>Hours of eating and drinking</fex> followed the wedding ceremony.
Hours of eating and drinking followed <fex>the wedding ceremony</fex>.
<fex>The mouse</fex> eluded the cats for only a few minutes.
The mouse eluded <fex>the cats</fex> for only a few minutes.
Rýmirez-Sýnchez , tried in absentia , had evaded <fex>capture</fex> since the murders in Paris on June 27 , 1975
Smithers got away <fex>at the stroke of midnight</fex>.
